• Push any piles that stick out 
gently back inside using a

• Ask your midwife, doctor

Skin and hair changes 
Hormonal changes taking 
place in pregnancy will make 
your nipples and the area 
around them go darker. Your 
skin colour may also darken 
a little, either in patches or all 
over. Birthmarks, moles and 
freckles may also darken.

line from their belly buttons
